item.title: About
item.description: Hi there, My name is Mischa van der Bent and I’m the author of this Blog. I made it to my experience while solving challenges. We all know how hard is to start something on the web, especially these days. You need to prepare a bunch of stuff, configure them and when that’s done — create the content. and if you want to support me: So, there you have it… enjoy!
